name: Lunar Launcher
description:
Created for Game Off 2020

https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2020

Please follow us!

https://linktr.ee/hephforgegaming

Lunar Launcher is the first game developed by Hephaestus' Forge!  It merges the fun of Angry Birds with cute art and the wonders of space!  

In Lunar Launcher you will fling rocks at the moons that are orbiting planets in an attempt to destroy them.  Free the planets of the burden of their gravity sucking leeches.  

Try to complete all the levels in lowest number of shots possible while meeting or exceeding the goals for each level to earn stars but beware of space phenomenon that will do its best to knock your shots off course!  

Try your hand and see how quickly you can destroy the moons plaguing these planets!

GAME PLAY:

  • Click and drag the rock back to aim and add power
  • Release mouse button and let it fly!

Please submit any bugs you find using our bug reporting form:

http://bugreports.hephforgegaming.com/

We have some really cute stickers and other items with the Planets and the Sun in our shop.  Feel free to take a look!

http://merch.hephforgegaming.com/

Special Thanks to those who contributed to make this jam a success!
